summary: WHEN MY DRIVER SIDE SLIDING DOOR CLOSES THE DOOR MAKES A LOUD GRINDING SOUND AND THE SENSOR WONT REGISTER THAT IT IS CLOSED. THE LIGHTS WILL STAY ON INSIDE BECAUSE THE DOOR IS STILL "OPEN" EVEN THOUGH IT LOOKS CLOSED. YOU HAVE TO PHYSICALLY PUSH THE BACK OF THE DOOR UNTIL YOU HEAR A CLICK, WHICH I ASSUME OF A LATCH ENGAGING. OR YOU CAN TURN THE POWER DOOR OFF AND CLOSE IT MANUALLY. THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON CONSISTENTLY FOR ABOUT 6 MONTHS NOW.
